title: Process Reinstatement with a Lapse in Coverage
description: A customer's policy cancelled for non-payment more than 30 days ago and they now want to reinstate, which will create a lapse in coverage.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their cancelled policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the policy and notes it is outside the no-lapse reinstatement window.

tasks.description: Explain to the customer that reinstating now will create a lapse in coverage and they must sign a 'No Loss' statement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the implications of the lapse.

tasks.description: Take the premium payment and process the reinstatement with a new effective date, creating a coverage gap.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent takes payment and reinstates the policy effective today.
